description: Job Title: Venture Associate Company: Entr3pnr.com Location: Remote Employment Type: Full-Time About Us: Entr3pnr.com is a private equity firm and CRM/cap table management software platform dedicated to empowering entrepreneurs and businesses. We help startups and companies manage their equity while connecting them to investment opportunities. Job Summary: We are looking for a results-driven Venture Associate to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for sourcing, negotiating, and closing clients to join our platform. Your primary focus will be to onboard companies that issue free equity through our platform while driving targets for paying customers. Key Responsibilities:     •    Identify and approach prospective businesses and entrepreneurs to onboard them onto our platform.     •    Persuade clients to issue free equity through our CRM and cap table management platform.     •    Meet and exceed targets for onboarding paying customers to the platform.     •    Build and maintain a pipeline of prospective clients and investors using outreach strategies and networking.     •    Conduct market research to identify promising startups and potential partners.     •    Develop proposals, pitch decks, and customized strategies to close deals effectively.     •    Maintain detailed records of interactions, client agreements, and progress in the CRM system.     •    Work closely with internal teams to ensure smooth onboarding and customer satisfaction. Qualifications:     •    Bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, or a related field.     •    Proven track record in sales, client acquisition, or business development.     •    Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills.     •    Goal-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving and exceeding targets.     •    Ability to analyze market trends and tailor approaches to client needs.     •    Familiarity with CRM systems and cap table management software is an advantage.     •    Entrepreneurial mindset with a passion for startups and private equity. What We Offer:     •    Performance-based incentives and rewards for achieving client acquisition and revenue targets.     •    A dynamic, fast-paced environment with opportunities for professional growth.     •    Collaborative culture with access to cutting-edge tools and resources.     •    Competitive base salary and benefits package. How to Apply: Send your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and how you would contribute to our mission. Join Entr3pnr.com and take an active role in shaping the future of entrepreneurship and equity management!
title: Entr3pnr.com venture associate

description: Job Description: We are seeking a skilled and engaging coding instructor to teach Python and potentially other programming languages to students aged 7-18. The instructor will create a positive and interactive learning experience tailored to the needs of students with varying levels of proficiency, from beginners to advanced learners. Responsibilities: Teach coding concepts, primarily in Python, to students ranging from primary to high school. Develop customized lesson plans and activities for different skill levels. Use creative and age-appropriate teaching methods to make coding fun and understandable. Provide regular progress updates and constructive feedback to students and parents. Create and assign coding projects that challenge and develop students’ problem-solving skills. Prepare students for coding competitions, school projects, or certifications, if applicable. Address questions and provide one-on-one support when needed. Requirements: Educational Background: A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (preferred). Certifications or relevant training in coding and programming (optional but beneficial). Technical Skills: Proficiency in Python is mandatory. Familiarity with other languages such as JavaScript, Scratch, HTML/CSS, or Java is a plus. Experience with coding tools, IDEs, and educational platforms for kids. Teaching Experience: Proven experience teaching coding to kids or teens, preferably online. Ability to simplify complex coding concepts for young learners. Experience working with diverse age groups (7-18 years). Soft Skills: Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Patience and enthusiasm for teaching young students. Creative and engaging teaching style to keep students motivated. Availability: Flexible schedule to accommodate students in different time zones. Commitment to conducting regular classes (mention frequency or schedule details if applicable). Equipment and Technology: Reliable high-speed internet connection. Familiarity with online teaching platforms (Zoom, Google Meet, etc.). Ability to create digital teaching materials (e.g., slides, videos). Preferred Qualities: Passionate about teaching and inspiring young minds. Familiarity with primary to high school coding curricula. Experience in preparing students for coding competitions or advanced courses. Additional Details: Specify your preferred teaching hours or time zones. Indicate whether the role is for group classes, one-on-one sessions, or both. Mention the duration of each class and the expected frequency (e.g., 2 hours per week). How to Apply: Please include the following in your application: Resume highlighting relevant teaching and coding experience. A short introduction or cover letter explaining your teaching approach and why you are a great fit. Samples of your teaching materials (if available). References or reviews from previous students/parents (if applicable).
title: Need a coding teaching for basic to advance level teaching of Python, Javascript, and others

description: Description: We are seeking an experienced Bubble.io developer with a strong background in software engineering (not just Bubble experience) to join our team and help enhance and maintain our live dating app. This app is already available on the App Store and has paying customers. We’re looking for an independent freelancer (no agencies, please) who is highly skilled, responsive, and thrives in a fast-paced, startup environment. If you love solving problems, squashing bugs, and improving functionality for real users, we’d love to hear from you! What We Need from You: Bubble.io expertise: Advanced proficiency in Bubble with hands-on experience developing and debugging complex apps. Software engineering skills: Strong coding and problem-solving abilities, ensuring scalable and maintainable solutions. Startup mindset: Ability to adapt quickly, think critically, and contribute innovative ideas. Commitment: 20 hours per week of dedicated, responsive support to handle bug fixes and feature updates. Strong communication skills: Ability to provide regular updates and collaborate with the team effectively. What You'll Be Working On: Debugging and fixing bugs in the existing app to enhance the user experience. Collaborating on feature updates to keep the app competitive and user-friendly. Ensuring the app remains responsive and performs optimally across devices. Addressing real-time issues reported by our users and team. What We Offer: A chance to work on a live product with real paying customers. A collaborative, startup-oriented environment. Competitive pay for a part-time, ongoing role (20 hours per week). If you're a Bubble.io expert with software engineering experience and are excited to work on a growing product in the dating app space, we’d love to hear from you! Please include your experience with Bubble.io and any relevant coding/software engineering projects in your application. If you're an agency - do not apply.

description: We have an old computer running widows CE with a a software that is 14 years old, we were able to get a newer version of the software which is 6 years old but we are having issues trying to copy the software over to the old computer as we cannot get into a safe mode to turn the software off from booting automatically, when do exit the software once booted it disables the keynote and mouse function in windows CE which makes us unable to do anything. Need to see if there is a way to modify the NK.bin so it stops automatically loading the software when windows CE loads up and a way to enable keyboard + mouse functions to allow to open file explorer etc to try to overwrite the old software
title: Edit a Windows CE bootloader NK.bin file to modify booting process and enable features that are off

description: The project involves: Hardware Design & Prototyping: Creating custom IoT units capable of operating in harsh marine environments with sensors for high temperature, water level, DC voltage, open fire, and shock detection technology integrated into robust IP67 enclosure. Network Design: The communication will utilize LoRaWAN for long-range, energy-efficient data transfer. Developing a reliable LoRaWAN "private" network to ensure consistent communication in marinas with thousands of boats in close proximity, built from varying materials such as fiberglass, aluminum, carbon, and wood. System Integration: Ensuring seamless operation between hardware, software, and networking components, including data transfer to cloud platforms. Web User Interface Development: Building a responsive platform for desktop and mobile, allowing users to access real-time data and actionable insights through an intuitive interface. The system must also be scalable, growing from hundreds to thousands of units based on customer needs. If this aligns with your expertise, we’d love to discuss how you can help bring this vision to life.
title: IoT development for harsh marine environments sensors.

description: We are looking for an innovative game designer to help create engaging, educational, and fun card and board games (physically printed) for our professional training workshops. These games will be used to teach leadership, hospitality skills, and employee engagement in an interactive and memorable way. If you have a passion for designing games that inspire learning while keeping players entertained, we’d love to hear from you! Scope of Work: You will design physical 2 card games and 1 board game for production tailored to specific training focuses: Card Games: 1. Leadership Development (targeted at leaders and managers). 2. Hospitality Skills (focused on frontline employees). Board Game Leadership game focusing on Employee Engagement & Culture Improvement to drive customer experience and business results. Deliverables: - Game Concepts: Creative and detailed concepts for each game (2 card games, 1 board game). - Game Mechanics: Clear rules, gameplay instructions, and any necessary components (e.g., cards, boards, tokens). - Prototypes: Printable prototypes or digital mockups of the games for testing purposes. - Revisions: Incorporation of feedback from initial playtests to refine the games. -Final Design Files: Ready-to-use designs for cards, boards, and other game components. Game Requirements: - Engaging & Educational: Games should be fun and interactive while teaching key skills. - Time Limits: Card games (10–30 minutes), board games (30–60 minutes). - User Focus: Hospitality skills games for frontline employees, leadership and engagement games for managers. - Easy Setup: Simple to learn and set up in a workshop setting. - Professional Look: Designs should align with our brand's professional and inspiring tone. Ideal Candidate: - Experience designing card and/or board games (portfolio required). - Familiarity with corporate training or educational content is a plus. - Strong creative and conceptual skills. - Ability to collaborate and iterate based on feedback. - Knowledge of game design tools and software. - Knowledge of companies to use to produce actual product (very important). Budget: Open to proposals. Please include an estimated cost for the project and your hourly or fixed rates. Application Requirements: - A brief introduction to your game design experience. - Portfolio or examples of previous game design work (especially educational or professional games). -Your estimated timeline for completion. About Us: Ignite Your Service Training and Consulting is a bespoke firm based in Central Florida. We specialize in leadership, customer experience, and employee engagement training. Our mission is to create lasting positive change in workplaces through impactful and memorable experiences. Learn more about us at https://www.igniteyourservice.com. Thank you for your time.
title: Design Physical Board Game and Card Game

description: We are a digital marketing group that specializes in SEO. We acquire warm leads who have shown interest in monthly SEO plans, typically starting at $500. Many of these leads are ready for a conversation, but they often receive calls from other providers as well. We want a Sales Representative who is comfortable calling leads several times a day. You will also send texts and emails. Timing is crucial, so you should be online and ready to engage when a fresh lead appears. Early on, you can expect to work around three hours per day, with growth potential up to six hours if the volume of leads increases. Your main aim is to persuade small companies to commit to a recurring plan for six months. We know that some businesses may be cautious about long-term plans. This is why we offer an accessible monthly rate and highlight the value of consistent SEO work. You will have scripts and initial training to help you. Our team can also join calls with larger prospects until you feel comfortable working solo. Compensation includes a $200 weekly base. Deals at $500 per month earn a 15% commission, paid every two weeks. Larger contracts yield 10% commission. The leads are not cheap, so we are selective. We want someone who can capitalize on every connection and drive revenue. We prefer candidates with proven sales experience. Previous involvement in digital marketing or SEO sales is ideal. You must be persuasive, self-driven, and reliable under pressure. Objection handling should come naturally to you. If that sounds like your style, we would like to speak with you. To apply, please share details on your past sales performance and your availability for daily contact with multiple leads. We are open to candidates who know how to close monthly subscriptions and keep clients satisfied long-term. * Must have a reliable internet connection and computer * Good pair of headsets since you will be calling using our software.
title: Commission Driven SEO Sales Closer Needed (Base+Commission)

description: Description: I am seeking a skilled developer to assist with completing and optimizing the sidebar navigation for a desktop application currently in production. The application uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, and the foundational codebase for the sidebar has already been built. Your role will be to finalize the sidebar, improve its visual design based on a photo I will provide, and ensure it is fully functional and optimized. Additionally, you will create placeholder pages for each button in the sidebar to maintain a consistent GUI throughout the application. If the initial work meets the project standards and expectations, there is potential for ongoing work to further enhance and develop additional features within the desktop application. Responsibilities 1. Finalize Sidebar Navigation: -Use the provided codebase, files, and folder structure to complete the existing sidebar navigation. - Refine and optimize the code for better performance and readability. - Enhance the visual design to align with the provided mockup or photo. 2. Placeholder Page Creation: - Create functional placeholder pages linked to each sidebar button. - Ensure the placeholder pages follow the design and layout style of the application. - Add appropriate styling and structure for a consistent user experience. 3. Code Quality: - Maintain clean, well-documented, and reusable code. - Test and debug the sidebar and placeholder pages to ensure error-free functionality. Requirements 1. Technical Skills: - Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for front-end development. - Strong knowledge of Python for backend integration. - Familiarity with frameworks like PyQt, Electron, or similar for desktop applications. - Experience with responsive and interactive UI design principles. 2. Experience: - Proven track record of developing or enhancing desktop applications. - Prior experience with building and styling navigation menus or sidebars. - Ability to work with existing codebases and improve them. Deliverables 1. Finalized Sidebar Navigation: - Fully functional and visually appealing sidebar. - Optimized code that integrates seamlessly with the existing application. 2. Placeholder Pages: - Individual placeholder pages for each button in the sidebar. - Consistent design and layout style across the application. 3. Documentation: - Clear and detailed comments in the code. - Instructions for maintaining or modifying the sidebar and pages in the future. If this project aligns with your skills and experience, I’d love to hear from you. Please include examples of relevant work or projects in your proposal.
title: Developer Needed for Sidebar Navigation and Placeholder Page Setup in Python Desktop Application

description: About Us: At AstralTech Labs, we specialize in delivering customized AI and software solutions that tackle real business challenges. From automating time-consuming processes to optimizing operations and enhancing decision-making, we equip businesses with the tools to boost productivity and achieve sustainable growth. Our tailored solutions turn raw data into actionable insights, cut operational costs, and proactively mitigate risks through advanced predictive analytics. Job Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled AI/ML Engineer to design, build, and deploy cutting-edge machine learning models and AI-driven solutions that address real-world challenges. In this role, you will work with cross-functional teams to analyze data, develop scalable algorithms, and integrate intelligent systems into production environments. Your work will focus on creating innovative solutions that improve efficiency, accuracy, and decision-making across diverse applications. Responsibilities: * Develop, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to solve business challenges. * Design and implement scalable pipelines for data collection, preprocessing, and model training. * Conduct exploratory data analysis and feature engineering to improve model performance. * Optimize and tune models for efficiency, accuracy, and scalability. * Integrate machine learning models into production systems and ensure seamless deployment. * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align solutions with business objectives. * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI/ML and propose innovative approaches to leverage emerging technologies. * Document experiments, processes, and results, and communicate findings to technical and non-technical stakeholders. Requirements: * Strong programming skills in Python with experience in frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn. * Proven experience with machine learning techniques such as regression, classification, clustering, and deep learning. * Proficiency in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data visualization. * Solid understanding of algorithms, statistics, and probability. * Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) and deploying ML models in production. * Knowledge of software engineering principles, version control (Git), and CI/CD practices. * Experience with LLMs, NLP, computer vision, or reinforcement learning. * Understanding of MLOps principles and tools for model monitoring and retraining. AstralTech Labs is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
title: AI/ML Engineer

description: About Us: At AstralTech Labs, we specialize in delivering customized AI and software solutions that tackle real business challenges. From automating time-consuming processes to optimizing operations and enhancing decision-making, we equip businesses with the tools to boost productivity and achieve sustainable growth. Our tailored solutions turn raw data into actionable insights, cut operational costs, and proactively mitigate risks through advanced predictive analytics. Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced Software Solution Architect to join our team and lead the design of innovative software solutions that align with our clients’ business objectives. In this role, you will work closely with sales executives to analyze requirements, create architectural blueprints, and deliver scalable, integrated solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both technology and business strategy, with proven experience in designing end-to-end software solutions. Responsibilities: * Engage with account executives to understand clients’ business goals, technical needs, and project requirements. * Translate business requirements into architectural solutions, creating a strategic roadmap that ensures alignment with client objectives. * Design high-level solutions, including system architecture, integration points, data flows, and technology stacks, ensuring scalability, security, and performance. * Select and recommend appropriate technologies, frameworks, and third-party services to support the solution. * Provide technical time estimates to support project planning, ensuring accuracy and feasibility. * Produce detailed solution documentation, including system diagrams, process flows, and technical requirements for client presentations. * Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, ensuring that the proposed solution is understood and aligned with business expectations. * Provide ongoing support throughout the project lifecycle, working with development teams to address any architectural challenges. * Conduct regular reviews of implemented solutions to ensure consistency with architectural plans and client requirements. Requirements: * Proven experience in solution architecture or a related role within a software development or consulting environment. * Strong proficiency in architectural design patterns, microservices, cloud computing (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud), and enterprise integration. * Experience with modern programming languages and frameworks (e.g., JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Kotlin, Swift, Go, Rust, Dart, React, Angular, Vue.js, Django, Flask, Flutter). * Solid understanding of system integration, including APIs, middleware, data flows, and third-party services. * Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical information to both technical and non-technical audiences. * Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail, with a proactive approach to identifying and mitigating potential risks. Preferred Qualifications: * Knowledge of regulatory compliance with highly regulated industries (healthcare, finance, etc.). * Experience with AI/ML model integration and data-driven solutions. * Knowledge of DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure-as-code tools. * Previous experience in a custom software development agency or consulting environment. AstralTech Labs is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

description: About Valiant: ‎ ‎ Valiant is a full-service content creation and digital marketing agency for service businesses in the trading, reselling, sports betting, and e-commerce niches. Our clients include some of the largest companies in the online side-hustle niche including Whop.com, one of the largest digital marketplace in the world. Our current offerings include short-form video creation, email marketing, and paid advertising, among others. Over the next 12 months we have plans to expand and as a result are looking to hire additional marketing staff in our sales and business growth teams. Our vision is to be the go-to marketing agency for all types of services that help people make money online. We are already very well known in the sports betting and reselling niches however are looking to venture much further into niches we’re less known in and build a market-wide reputation for ruthlessly outperforming other marketers in the space. Compensation & Perks: 💸 $2,000 to $6,000 in monthly performance based pay. 📈 Up to $12k in monthly fixed salary based on initial 60-day performance. 🌎 Full-time remote-based position with flexible working hours. ✈️ Flights, US visa sponsorship, and accommodation for team meetups. Job Responsibilities: – Conducting daily outreach to a set number of leads via email, phone, and social media. – Utilizing and adding to outreach templates and scripts tailored to each industry or client segment. – Manage and update CRM with relevant lead and prospect information. – Assess the fit between potential clients and our company’s services. – Schedule and set up meetings or calls between qualified leads and the sales team. – Build rapport with potential clients and nurture relationships with qualified leads until they are ready for the sales process. – Act as the first point of contact for new prospects and establish a positive, lasting impression. – Stay updated on industry trends, market changes, and competitor activities to identify potential opportunities. – Work closely with the sales team to ensure alignment on targets, strategy, and lead qualification. Required Qualifications: – Must be fluent in English. If English is your second language, you must be willing to take an English test and pass as fluent. – Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage in meaningful conversations with businesses. – A passion for building relationships and a high degree of professionalism. – Willingness to learn and grow in the field of business development, with openness to feedback. – Prior experience in sales, customer service, or business outreach is a plus but not required. – Ability to manage time efficiently and stay organized in a fast-paced environment. – Comfortable using digital tools and platforms to track outreach and results. Preferred Qualifications: – Based in the United States, Canada, South Africa, the United Kingdom or Oceania. – Experience or understanding of different forms of marketing, brand development or advertising. – Experience as a BDR or SDR. – Experience with CRMs, or even better, Monday CRM. – Experience as an account manager or account executive. – Any other past sales or business experience. – Based in Florida, or even better, the Miami-Dade area. – Previous experience starting a business or experience working at smaller companies/startups. – Bachelors or Masters in business, sales or other relevant degrees. – Knowledge, or interest in sports betting, trading, reselling, online selling, or e-commerce. Who We Need: – You’ve got positive energy. You’re optimistic about the future and determined to get there. – You are looking for an exciting opportunity that isn’t just about the money. – You’re comfortable with agile workflow and are quick to iterate. – You work well with direct, rapid, and candid feedback. – You’re both an active communicator and an eager listener. – You’re passionate about sales and have high standards for your messages. – You are willing to take 100% responsibility for your conversations. – You’re willing to go outside of your comfort zone and you’re up for new challenges. – You are a very hard-working and driven person, and are flexible with your work days/hours. – You have a winners mindset. You want to win and you’re not satisfied with the status quo. – You are comfortable with startup culture. It’s casual, and not corporate, but is demanding.

description: ***NO AI-GENERATED RESPONSES*** AI-generated responses will be printed out, burned, and possibly urinated on by dogs. Job Description: * Seeking a principal- or senior-level software engineer to design, develop, and implement an ultra-low-latency voice transcription application for device-level deployment. Required Experience: * Must have prior hands-on experience implementing or overseeing the development of voice translation interface(s) having low-latency as a critical requirement. * Must have a broad knowledge of the landscape of speech-to-text libraries and technologies. * Must have prior experience integrating machine learning models (speech recognition, NLP) into such an application, where necessary. Preferred Experience: *10+ years overall sw development experience with at least 5 yrs experience hands-on coding. Deliverable: * We have a working PoC that uses vosk's 40mb model for the transcription and our c# application listens to its broadcast then processes pre-defined keywords to execute core functions of our application. * We've experimented a bit with the available parameters but haven't seemed to have found the sweetspot between accuracy/dependency and performance (latency). * The ideal candidate will take a cursory look at the existing solution to determine what part of it (if any) can be used to accomplish our key objective of low latency and accuracy, in order to refine/expand upon the existing solution or replace it altogether. * We're targeting Friday, Jan 31 for delivery of the feature into production, which gives us a week or two to find the right candidate and buffer the holidays, then another two weeks or so to build and debug the solution over the course of 1-2 sprints, add some basic technical documentation to our Confluence, and specify the minimum/recommended hardware/system requirements for the user. Thanks for reading!
title: Ultra low latency voice translation interface

description: Hello! My name is Frederic, and I am a PhD student at Carnegie Mellon University's Human-Computer Interaction Institute. I am currently studying novel interfaces to help designers learn to better collaborate and co-create with AI systems on complex 3D CAD design tasks. Through this work, I aim to gather insights for developing future support interfaces for generative AI design software. For a study, I am seeking a person with mechanical design experience and familiarity with Autodesk Fusion 360. During the study, you will be asked to complete a design task (e.g., designing an engine bracket) within Fusion360. The study is conducted over Zoom, and you will be video, audio, and screen recorded during the task. The study comprises two sessions (30 minutes and 100 minutes), and we can schedule these sessions to match your available time. I am especially looking for people familiar with Fusion 360 but have NOT previously worked with the Generative Design feature. Please let me know if you are interested in participating or have further questions. I look forward to hearing back from you! Best, Frederic
title: Looking for a Mechanical Designer for Research Study

description: I've created a table outlining a proposed schedule for your 20,000 square foot warehouse project in Lake City, GA. This timeline aims to accomplish all tasks within 90 days, including structural engineering, architectural plans, MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing) design, and 3D rendering. Phase Task Duration Due Date Payment Schedule 1 Project Kickoff & Initial Consultation 3 days Day 3 10% of total fee 2 Conceptual Design & Schematic Layout 10 days Day 13 15% of total fee 3 Structural Engineering Analysis 14 days Day 27 20% of total fee 4 Architectural Plans Development 21 days Day 48 20% of total fee 5 MEP Design 14 days Day 62 15% of total fee 6 3D Rendering 14 days Day 76 10% of total fee 7 Final Review and Revisions 7 days Day 83 5% of total fee 8 Project Completion & Deliverables 7 days Day 90 5% of total fee Please note that this timeline is ambitious and may need to be adjusted based on the structural engineer's workload and the complexity of the project13. The payment schedule is structured to align with key milestones and deliverables throughout the project. Some key considerations for the structural engineer: The timeline allows for overlap between some phases to maximize efficiency. The structural engineering analysis is given priority to ensure a solid foundation for subsequent design work. 3D rendering is scheduled towards the end of the project when most design elements are finalized4. A final review period is included to address any necessary revisions or adjustments. When presenting this proposal to the structural engineer, emphasize that you're open to discussing adjustments to the timeline if needed, while still aiming to complete the project within the 90-day timeframe. Additionally, be prepared to provide any specific requirements or constraints for the warehouse that might impact the design process Must be licensed in the State of Georgia.
title: Structural engineer / architectural plans / MEP / 3D rendering

description: Join the development team of Surreality, a transformative platform that combines cutting-edge AI-driven technology, grief therapy, and memory preservation. Surreality’s vision is to help individuals preserve cherished memories, reconnect with loved ones through AI-generated Digital Essences, and find healing through immersive and empathetic experiences. This revolutionary platform leverages AI, VR/AR, and blockchain technology to redefine how we process grief and nostalgia, providing tools to create lifelike digital representations of loved ones, immersive virtual environments, and secure spaces for emotional reflection. Surreality also integrates its proprietary cryptocurrency, SurrealiCoin, to support its ecosystem and future expansion. Within this role, you will play a vital part in building the platform’s core functionalities, ensuring scalability, and delivering meaningful experiences that blend emotional depth with technological innovation. By joining the Surreality team, you will contribute to a groundbreaking project that bridges the gap between technology and humanity. The ideal candidate will be skilled in designing secure, high-performance server-side systems and integrating AI/ML models into applications. This role is essential for ensuring the platform's reliability, scalability, and data security across all devices. Responsibilities: Backend Architecture Development: Design and implement scalable, cloud-based backend systems to support multimedia storage, AI processing, and VR/AR functionalities. Develop APIs for seamless integration between mobile apps, AI features, and immersive environments. Security and Compliance: Ensure user data is encrypted and secure, adhering to GDPR, HIPAA, and other global privacy standards. Implement role-based access controls and data management protocols. Integration and Optimization: Work with AI/ML engineers to integrate and deploy machine learning models for real-time interactions. Optimize backend systems for performance and scalability, ensuring a smooth user experience during peak loads. Collaboration: Collaborate with frontend developers, AI/ML engineers, and VR/AR specialists to align backend functionalities with user-facing features. Support DevOps pipelines for deployment, testing, and scaling. Data Management: Develop efficient storage solutions for multimedia content and AI training data. Enable intuitive search and retrieval mechanisms for user-uploaded content. Requirements: Proficiency in backend development using Node.js, Python (Django/Flask), Ruby on Rails, or similar frameworks. Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Firebase for scalable infrastructure. Strong knowledge of database systems (SQL and NoSQL). Expertise in API design and implementation (REST, GraphQL). Understanding of data encryption, security standards, and compliance regulations. Experience deploying and managing machine learning models in production is a plus. Compensation: Payment will be approved upon funding completion. Team members will also receive SurrealiCoin tokens as part of their compensation, offering a stake in the platform’s long-term success. Team Confirmation for Investors: This position will be reserved as part of our official team presented to investors. While no immediate work is required until funding is secured, confirming your role demonstrates our readiness to proceed with development. Once funding is complete, work will begin immediately, and compensation will be issued as per the agreed terms. Questions for Applicants: Have you developed scalable backend systems for platforms handling multimedia data? What experience do you have with integrating AI/ML models into backend systems? How do you approach data encryption and compliance with privacy regulations like GDPR or HIPAA? Which cloud platforms and database systems are you most comfortable working with? What is your expected timeline for developing and deploying a backend infrastructure for the platform? Next Steps: Please share your resume, portfolio, and a brief explanation of how your experience aligns with Surreality’s vision and technical requirements. If selected, you’ll play a critical role in building a secure, scalable platform that redefines grief therapy and memory preservation. Looking forward to hearing from you! Best regards, Dewight Andrew Rutherford Founder & Chief Visionary Officer, Surreality www.surrealityai.com
title: Backend Developer for Scalable and Secure Digital Platforms.

description: I am a business owner in the software industry, selling solutions to barbers and barbershops. My primary method of prospecting involves Google Maps. I’m looking for an expert to help automate the process of identifying and contacting new barbershops listed on Google Maps in specific locations (e.g., Austin, TX). The goal is to set up a system that: 1. Automatically detects new barbershop listings in Google Maps based on a query (e.g., “Barber shops in Austin, TX”). 2. Saves relevant details (e.g., Name, Address, Place ID, Date Added) into a Google Sheet. 3. Sends me an alert (via email or other methods) whenever a new shop is added. Scope of Work - Integrate Google Maps API with Google Sheets using automation tools (e.g., Make.com/Integromat, Zapier, or custom scripting). - Set up filters to avoid duplicates and ensure only new listings are added. - Configure a notification system to alert me in real-time when new shops are detected. - Test the automation to ensure accuracy and reliability. Deliverables: - Fully automated system integrating Google Maps API, Google Sheets, and notification alerts. - Documentation or training on how to maintain or update the system if needed.

description: About Us: Our company is a fast-growing e-commerce company specializing in the sale of used and refurbished electronics, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, cameras, networking gear, and other consumer electronics. Most of your day will consist of doing price research then setting pricing on products we have in stock, logging prices in Google Sheets, and reviewing current marketplace listings to monitor the listing quality. Prepare detailed reports and meet with owners and key stake holders frequently to discuss the state of the business along with future strategy. Key Responsibilities: - 70% of the job is to develop and execute pricing strategies to optimize margins and drive sales growth. - Manage and oversee product listings across multiple online marketplaces (eBay, Walmart, Back Market, Amazon). - Ensure all items are accurately listed, competitively priced, and optimized for search visibility and conversion. - Monitor marketplace trends, competition, and pricing to adjust strategies as needed. - Maintain a high standard of customer service, handling customer inquiries, issues, and feedback efficiently and professionally. - Collaborate with other departments, including marketing, inventory, and shipping, to ensure smooth operations and fulfillment. - Analyze sales data and marketplace performance to identify opportunities for improvement and growth. - Stay up-to-date with marketplace policies, best practices, and industry trends. Requirements: - 3+ years of experience in eCommerce management. - Proven experience with major online marketplaces (eBay, Walmart, Back Market, Amazon). - Expertise in the used/refurbished electronics category, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, cameras, and networking gear. - Strong understanding of marketplace dynamics, including listing optimization, pricing strategies, and customer service best practices. - Excellent analytical skills with the ability to provide and interpret sales data and market trends. - Exceptional organizational and multitasking abilities. - Strong communication and interpersonal skills. - Proficiency with e-commerce tools and software. - Detail-oriented with a commitment to accuracy and quality. Preferred Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. - Experience with inventory management systems. - Familiarity with SEO best practices for online marketplaces.

description: Job Title: DevSecOps Engineer / Cloud Infrastructure Architect Location: Remote / Hybrid (Flexible) Employment Type: Gig / Part / Full-Time Industry: Cloud Infrastructure, Cybersecurity, and Application Integration About the Role CruxTech is a startup looking for an experienced and motivated DevSecOps Engineer/Architect to configure, implement, and integrate a highly scalable, secure, and observable platform based on Rocky Linux and cloud-native technologies. This role will be pivotal in implementing Zero Trust Architecture (ZTA) principles, a service mesh (Istio), and microservices orchestration using OKD (Kubernetes) and Docker. The ideal candidate should be able to work independently, meet milestone objectives, and have verifiable expertise in building and maintaining modern infrastructures with a focus on security, scalability, and resilience. You will work closely with the Chief Technical Officer to ensure all software components integrate seamlessly to meet customer objectives. Key Responsibilities Platform Design and Implementation • Implement and integrate a Rocky Linux-based infrastructure that supports microservices, middleware, and containerized applications. • Deploy and configure OKD (Kubernetes) and Docker for orchestrating containerized microservices. • Implement and configure Istio/Linkerd service mesh for traffic management, security, and observability. Security and Zero Trust Architecture • Develop and integrate Zero Trust Architecture principles, including: o Mutual TLS (mTLS) for secure communication between services. o Authentication, authorization, and role-based access controls (RBAC) using Keycloak. • Deploy host-based intrusion detection systems (HIDS) such as Wazuh/OSSEC to secure edge devices and servers. • Ensure compliance with STIG/ACASS security guidelines for all system components. Data Management and Middleware • Integrate and manage Kafka (Confluent) for real-time data streaming and message brokering. • Implement persistent storage solutions for containers, such as GlusterFS or Ceph. Monitoring, Observability, and Analytics • Implement comprehensive observability tools: o Metrics collection using Prometheus. o Log aggregation and analysis using ELK Stack or Graylog. o Distributed tracing with Jaeger or Zipkin. • Monitor system health, performance, and security, proactively addressing issues. Automation and CI/CD • Maintain CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments using tools like Ansible, Jenkins, or GitLab CI/CD. • Automate infrastructure management with Terraform or other Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) tools. Collaboration and Documentation • Collaborate with Leadership and development teams to ensure secure and scalable microservices deployments. • Document system designs, configurations, and best practices for internal teams. Required Qualifications Technical Skills • Operating Systems: Expertise in Rocky Linux / Red Hat Linux-based environments. • Containers and Orchestration: o Strong knowledge of Docker and container orchestration tools like OKD or Red Hat Open Shift (Kubernetes). • Service Mesh: Experience implementing and managing Istio or Linkerd for microservice communication. • Security: o Strong understanding of Zero Trust Architecture (ZTA) principles. o Experience with security tools like Wazuh, OSSEC, SELinux, and Firewalld. • Middleware: o Hands-on experience with message streaming platforms like Apache Kafka. • Observability: o Experience with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, and the ELK Stack. • Networking: o Familiarity with load balancing, mTLS encryption, DNS, and network security. • Automation: o Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform or Ansible. o CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or similar). Soft Skills • Strong communication and documentation skills. • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines. • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Preferred Qualifications • Familiarity with STIG/ACASS compliance and cybersecurity standards. • Experience with FreeIPA or Keycloak for identity and access management. • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and edge computing. • Previous experience implementing service meshes in production environments. Why Join Us? • Opportunity to be part of the startup team that is building a cutting-edge infrastructure solution to support local, state, and federal customers. • Work independently with flexibility to develop a scalable and secure framework that will scale from small to enterprise levels. • Key contributor to shaping CruxTech Zero Trust security architectures and scalable cloud-native platform. Compensation • Salary requirements negotiable based on experience.
title: Rocky Linux DEVSECOPS / Cloud Infrastructure Developer

description: 1. Search Algorithm: You will need to develop or implement a search algorithm that can crawl the web, index pages, and provide relevant results to users based on their queries. 2. Web Crawlers: You will need to design and implement web crawlers that can traverse the web and collect data from web pages to create an index of all the web pages. 3. Indexing and storage: You will need to store the data collected by the crawlers and create an index that allows for efficient search and retrieval of relevant information. 4. User Interface: You will need to design a user-friendly interface that allows users to enter search queries and receive results that are relevant and easy to navigate. 5. Hardware: Depending on the scale of your search engine, you may need to invest in powerful hardware to handle the heavy computational demands of indexing and searching the web. 6. Data privacy: You will need to ensure that your search engine website is compliant with data privacy regulations, such as GDPR, and that user data is securely stored and protected. 7. Maintenance: You will need to continuously update and maintain your search engine website to ensure that it remains up-to-date and relevant to users.

description: About Us: Small accounting firm with 5-person staff providing top-tier bookkeeping and accounting services to small businesses primarily in the Southeast United States. Role Overview: We’re seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Accountant to review and analyze financial data, mentor entry-level bookkeepers, and ensure accuracy in client accounts. This is a contract position with an initial commitment of 10 hours per week, with the potential to grow to 20 hours per week if desired. Responsibilities: • Review and Analyze Financials: Conduct detailed reviews of balance sheets, profit and loss statements, and other financial reports for accuracy and compliance. • Provide Feedback and Mentor Bookkeepers: Document errors and provide feedback (written and via video calls) to entry-level bookkeepers to support their learning and improvement. • Reconciliations and Adjustments: Perform complex reconciliations (e.g., payroll liabilities, sales tax liabilities) and create adjusting journal entries as necessary. • Client Communication: Request statements and documents from clients via email and follow up with non-responsive clients every 7 days. • Collaborate with Offshore Team: Work effectively with offshore bookkeepers, providing guidance and support as needed. • SOP Creation and Refinement: Develop and refine Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for our various client teams (preferred but not required). • Meeting Availability: Have some availability for video calls during the hours of 8:30 AM to 1:30 PM EST, Monday through Friday, to collaborate with our offshore team. Requirements: • At least 2 years of experience in accounting or bookkeeping roles. • Prior experience in roles with direct reports, regardless of industry. • In-depth knowledge of when to capitalize purchases, how to manage equity accounts, and analyze financial reports. • Expertise in reconciling complex transactions and resolving unreconciled balances. • Ability to document feedback and support entry-level bookkeepers’ development. • Familiarity with the flow of bookkeeping and financial statements to Schedule C and 1120S forms. • Strong communication skills (both written and verbal). • Must be based in the United States. • Minimum 10 hours per week, with up to 20 hours available if desired. • Reliable laptop with Windows 10 or 11 (software such as MS365 will be provided). • Must pass a background check. Assessment Process: Selected candidates will complete a paid 1–2 hour assessment independently. This assessment evaluates their ability to analyze financial statements and provide constructive feedback to bookkeepers. If you are a detail-oriented accounting professional with a passion for mentoring and improving financial workflows, we’d love to hear from you! Apply today to join our remote team and grow with us.
title: Senior Accountant – 100% Remote

Preferred Qualifications: ● Experience with dynamic pricing tools such as Wheelhouse, Beyond Pricing, or PriceLabs. ● Knowledge of property management systems (PMS) and their integration with OTA platforms. ● Familiarity with short-term rental industry regulations and trends. description: Company Overview: The Washington Informer is a trusted local news source that has served the community for nearly six decades. As we approach our 60th anniversary, we continue to uphold our commitment to delivering impactful journalism that informs, educates, and empowers our readers. We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Accounts Receivable Specialist to join our finance team and help us continue our mission. Position Summary:The Accounts Receivable Specialist manages the organization’s accounts receivable process, ensuring accurate and timely payment collection from clients and customers. This role involves working closely with various departments to resolve billing issues, maintain accurate records, and ensure that all receivables are collected within the agreed-upon terms. Key Responsibilities: Invoice Management: Generate and distribute accurate invoices to customers and clients promptly. Payment Processing: Record and process incoming payments and posted promptly and correctly. Account Reconciliation: Reconcile the accounts receivable ledger to ensure all payments are accounted for and correctly posted. Collections: Monitor accounts to identify outstanding debts, initiate collection activities, and follow up with customers on overdue payments. Customer Relations: Serve as customers’ primary point of contact regarding billing inquiries, disputes, and payment arrangements. Reporting: Prepare and present regular reports on accounts receivable status, including aging reports and cash flow projections. Compliance: Ensure compliance with financial policies and procedures, as well as relevant regulations and standards. Qualifications: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or related fields, or at least 8+ years of experience in accounts receivable or a similar role, preferably in the media or publishing industry. Skills: Proficiency in GAAP and accounting software. Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage, etc.) and Microsoft Office Suite, particularly Excel. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Strong attention to detail, accuracy and analytical skills. Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality. Excellent communication and customer service skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Additional Information: Work Environment: This position offers a hybrid work environment with both in-office and remote work opportunities.
title: Accounts Receivable Specialist

description: Description: We are seeking an experienced consultant to help us conduct a thorough audit of our current systems, tools, and vendor relationships. The goal of this project is to gain a clear understanding of our operational landscape, identify opportunities for optimization, and create a roadmap for more efficient system utilization. The selected consultant will be responsible for: Audit and Mapping: Documenting all current vendors, tools, systems, and software in use. Identifying the number of licenses and/or credits associated with each tool. Mapping out how these tools interact and integrate with one another. Compiling data on costs, usage, and renewal dates for all systems. Analysis and Recommendations: Providing a detailed analysis of redundancies, inefficiencies, or underutilized tools. Recommending which systems or tools should be retained, replaced, consolidated, or eliminated. Outlining the cost implications of these recommendations (e.g., savings, investment needed). Providing a clear rationale for each recommendation, supported by data and insights. Deliverables: A comprehensive vendor and system map with associated costs, renewal dates, and utilization levels. A detailed recommendation report with proposed changes, rationale, and cost implications. An actionable roadmap for implementing the recommended changes. Ideal Candidate: We are looking for someone with: Proven experience in systems audits, vendor management, and operational consulting. Strong analytical and organizational skills to map out complex systems and vendors. Excellent communication skills to present findings and recommendations clearly. Familiarity with SaaS tools, licenses, integrations, and renewal management. Ability to assess cost impacts and articulate the value of recommendations.

description: We are seeking an experienced Power BI developer to create an inventory management dashboard. The ideal candidate will be skilled in designing interactive and visually appealing dashboards that effectively track inventory levels, sales, and trends. The dashboard should provide real-time insights and be user-friendly for our team to utilize. Previous experience with inventory management systems and data visualization is essential. Please share your portfolio showcasing similar projects you've completed in the past. The purpose of this project is to create an Inventory Control dashboard that allows buyers to make strategic stock orders based on usage, lead time, and buying discounts. The following scope of work is the minimum of what the dashboard should be capable of doing. Our existing ERP software (Field Servio) provides access to data tables via SQL server. The information should refresh automatically a minimum of once per day. Ideally the information would refresh in real time throughout the day. We understand that the solution will require software subscriptions (Power BI, fabric, or Tableau, etc.); the end product should not require any reoccurring consultant labor to refresh or maintain the connection to the source data. The finished product will be the sole intellectual property of Associated Compressor & Equipment LLC with no royalties or licensing fees other than the software subscriptions mentioned above. • Breakdown all inventory items by North, Central, and South warehouses. Give the Buyer the option to look at items by individual warehouses and also to roll the totals up into a consolidated total. Some part numbers will be stocked in multiple warehouses. • Calculate the Average Monthly Usage (AMU) and Average Daily Usage (ADU) by Warehouse based on a rolling six month sales average • Calculate the average lead time of an item by looking at the time between when each PO was placed and when the line items were received. Average these values over a rolling 6-month historical period. • Allow a “Safety Stock” quantity to be assigned to each item in each warehouse. • Calculate an “Order Point” using the formula below and display this value for each item in each warehouse. Allow these values to roll-up into a consolidated total for each item. o Order Point = (Lead Time * ADU) + Safety Stock • Calculate a “Net Available” quantity for each item in each warehouse using the formula below. Allow these values to roll-up into a consolidated total for each item. o Net Available = On Hand – Committed – Backordered + On Order • Calculate a Recommended Order Quantity whenever the Net Available is less than the Order Point. • Create a user interface Dashboard that allows the buyer to do the following: o Filter items by Vendor, Warehouse, Item Type, Item Category, and Product Line. o Sort and filter items by Cost, AMU, ADU, Average Lead Time, Safety Stock, Order Point, Net Available, and Recommended Order Quantity. o Allow the buyer to select items to include on the next PO and export the list of items and quantities to a template that the ERP software can import to produce the actual PO for the vendor. o Display the total dollar value and total quantity of the selected items so the Buyer can “build” the purchase order before exporting it.
title: Power BI Inventory Management Dashboard Development

description: IT Global Services is a technology-driven solutions provider specializing in helping clients optimize their email communication strategies, improve deliverability, and enhance their online presence. We focus on providing advanced IT solutions to businesses across various industries, helping them build robust and effective systems. Position Overview: We are seeking an Email Deliverability Expert to join our team in a client-facing role. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in inbox placement, email deliverability optimization, backend email automation, and reporting systems. You will be responsible for working directly with clients to build out email automation systems, configure DNS and reporting settings, and ensure top-tier inbox placement. This role will primarily focus on the backend infrastructure required to support high-performing email campaigns for various clients. Key Responsibilities: Inbox Placement & Deliverability Optimization: Work closely with clients to ensure email campaigns reach the inbox, using best practices for email authentication, reputation management, and spam filtering. API Integration & Email Sending: Leverage your coding skills to build and configure email sending systems through APIs (e.g., SendGrid, Amazon SES) for seamless integration. DNS & Reporting Configuration: Set up and maintain DNS records (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) for clients to improve deliverability and protect against spoofing and phishing. Automated Email Flow Setup: Develop backend systems for automating client email campaigns, ensuring smooth workflows and optimized deliverability. Email Performance Reporting: Provide clients with deliverability insights by analyzing email performance metrics, offering solutions for continuous improvement, and generating detailed reports. Client Collaboration: Engage directly with clients to understand their email needs, deliverability challenges, and campaign objectives. Translate those into actionable, technical solutions. Ongoing Monitoring & Troubleshooting: Monitor email campaigns for deliverability issues, troubleshoot problems, and provide ongoing support to resolve any challenges related to inbox placement. Required Skills & Qualifications: Proven expertise in email deliverability, inbox placement, and spam filtering. Strong experience with email sending via APIs (SendGrid, Amazon SES, etc.). Advanced understanding of DNS records (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) and email authentication protocols. Hands-on experience building and managing automated email systems. Solid understanding of email campaign performance tracking, metrics analysis, and reporting. Ability to troubleshoot and resolve email deliverability issues efficiently. Strong client-facing communication skills with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Proficient in coding languages (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript) for backend email integration. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Preferred Qualifications: Experience working with high-volume email senders or enterprise-level email marketing systems. Background in working with clients in industries that rely heavily on email marketing, such as eCommerce, nonprofits, or political campaigns. Familiarity with email automation platforms and CRM systems (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce, Marketo). Experience with email security protocols (e.g., DMARC, DKIM) and deliverability tools.

description: Hello, Our Content Creator Management Agency is looking for a Financial Manager who can help with the following - put together monthly reports for each client's P&L - Assist with Payroll - Maintain financial records and monthly P&L - Assist with Financial Analysis Below is a more in depth job description please share your relevant experience when applying Reports To: Founder About Us: Model Starz is a leading marketing agency specializing in innovative strategies and creative solutions for our diverse client base. Our team is passionate about driving results and delivering exceptional value to our clients. We are seeking a skilled Financial Manager to join our dynamic team and oversee the financial health and growth of our agency. Job Overview: As the Financial Manager at Model Starz, you will play a pivotal role in managing the agency’s financial operations, including budgeting, forecasting, financial reporting, and compliance. You will work closely with the Founder to develop financial strategies that support the agency’s growth objectives and ensure the efficient allocation of resources. Your expertise will be essential in optimizing financial performance and providing insights that guide decision-making. Key Responsibilities: Financial Planning & Analysis: Develop and manage the agency’s annual budget, including revenue projections, expense planning, and cash flow management. Financial Reporting: Prepare and present monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports to Founder, providing insights and recommendations based on financial data. Cost Management: Monitor and control costs across departments, ensuring efficient use of resources and alignment with budgetary goals. Revenue Management: Analyze revenue streams, client profitability, and project margins to identify opportunities for growth and optimization. Compliance & Risk Management: Ensure compliance with all financial regulations, tax requirements, and internal policies. Identify and manage financial risks, implementing mitigation strategies as needed. Payroll & Invoicing: Oversee the payroll process, ensuring accuracy and timely payments. Manage invoicing and accounts receivable to maintain healthy cash flow. Financial Strategy: Collaborate with senior management to develop financial strategies that support the agency’s long-term objectives and business development efforts. Audit Coordination: Lead the preparation for internal and external audits, ensuring all financial records are accurate and up to date. Vendor & Client Relations: Manage financial relationships with vendors, clients, and other stakeholders, including contract negotiations and payment terms. Team Leadership: Lead and mentor a small finance team, providing guidance and support to ensure high performance and professional growth. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field. A Master’s degree or professional certification (e.g., CPA, CFA) is preferred. 5+ years of experience in financial management, preferably within a marketing or creative agency. Strong knowledge of financial principles, accounting standards, and financial regulations. Proficiency in financial management software (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero, Excel) and reporting tools. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen eye for detail. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to present financial information clearly and concisely. Experience in budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling. description: The problem. As a 2-person executive team at a local non-profit, we find ourselves overwhelmed with all the tasks and demands of leading. Problems include: - Difficulties of keeping track of all the open tasks, followup tasks, individual staff tasks - Difficulty of sorting through all the inputs to find the priority task for the day/week (for example, an important task gets lost in our current Google Doc) - Lack of a one-system view, i.e., one place to see all the open projects at the same time The solution. We are looking for an expert in task process and flow to coach us on organizing the tasks that are associated with leading. Our current system includes a combination of Google Workspace tools such as, Google Docs, Sheets and notes on Keep. We are looking for one tool/software suit that can provide team-oriented functionality such as: - Real time collaborative text editing - Tagging different people for tasks - Hierarchy of task prioritization - Ways to organize projects in one view - Ways to track tasks that are waiting on replies, pending some other action - Primarily for 2 people, but expandable as needed - Accessible from iPhone, Android, and Windows platforms (web based access is fine) Coach will: - Get to know the executive team to identify the needs and comfort levels to find the best solution - Recommend an app/suite that best fits the clients’ needs - Give guidance and check-ins in implementing the recommended package Other details - Familiarity with David Allen’s Getting Things Done is a plus but not necessary - Organization apps that we’ve used with varying success include Basecamp, Evernote, and Todoist - Start time for this contract will be January 6, 2025. There will be a pause in the contract from January 20-31.
title: Organizational coach for 2-person executive team

description: We’re looking for a mechanical engineer with a passion for automotive performance to finalize the design of a new transmission support crossmember, including simulation. The design must meet specific fitment and strength criteria. Production method will utilize multiple laser cut steel pieces, bent in a press brake, and welded using a custom alignment fixture. This is a short-term contract position, but our company is growing so we would prefer to establish a long-term relationship with a freelancer who can grow with us. We have built our reputation by creating high quality parts for the automotive aftermarket. Our work has been featured in numerous publications, and we ship parts worldwide. Responsibilities: - Optimize the structural integrity, performance, and reliability of components and systems; part is designed using 3/16” mild steel. - Utilize advanced computational methods to test and validate product designs, including but not limited to finite element analysis (FEA) and fatigue analysis, to ensure we meet or exceed load and fatigue goals. - Develop and communicate strategies for optimizing mechanical components to minimize material usage and production time. Requirements: - Deep understanding of the mechanics of materials, vibration, dynamics, linear and non-linear simulation methodologies - Demonstrated experience communicating results with non-engineers - Ability to educate non-engineers - Automotive part design experience - Mechanical assembly design and validation experience - Designing steel parts to be produced via cutting, bending, and welding - Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering; Masters preferred - CAD models to be provided in Solidworks. Preference is for the use of Solidworks Simulation, but open to other FEA/simulation software upon suggestion - Must be located in the USA and must sign our standard NDA
title: Project Engineer - Transmission Crossmember

description: Job Description: BEYOND Academy is seeking a skilled and experienced Online Course Producer to help bring our Ecstatic Dance DJ and Leadership Training programs to life. BEYOND Academy is our educational platform, designed to empower the next generation of leaders and artists in the conscious dance community through world-class Ecstatic Dance DJ and leadership trainings. Add branded graphics, slides, captions, and music where appropriate. Collaborate with facilitators to ensure content is delivered clearly and engagingly. Platform Setup & Integration: Upload all course content onto our chosen Learning Management System (LMS) (e.g., Teachable, Kajabi, Thinkific). Collaboration & Communication: Coordinate with facilitators, guest teachers, and the BEYOND team for approvals and timelines. Offer suggestions for improving content delivery and pacing. Quality Control: Review the course for clarity, consistency, and engagement. Troubleshoot any technical issues on the platform. Requirements: Proven experience producing online courses or similar digital learning projects. Proficiency in video editing software (Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools). Familiarity with popular LMS platforms like Teachable, Kajabi, or Thinkific. Strong project management skills and ability to meet deadlines. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. A keen eye for design and user experience. Bonus: Familiarity or interest in music, dance, or conscious/spiritual communities. What We Offer: An opportunity to work on a transformative project with global reach. Collaborative work with a passionate team leading impactful programs. Flexible working hours and remote setup. Potential for long-term collaboration as we expand BEYOND Academy's offerings. How to Apply: Please submit: A short cover letter explaining why you're a good fit for this role. description: Business Analyst – HubSpot CRM Data Migration Documentation We are seeking a detail-oriented Business Analyst (BA) to document the end-to-end process of migrating data to HubSpot CRM. In this role, you will act as the primary bridge between stakeholders and technical teams, ensuring that every stage of the migration is well-documented, mapped to business requirements, and aligned with HubSpot’s data structure. This position focuses on creating comprehensive documentation, enabling smooth communication, and validating the quality of the migrated data. Requirements: - 5+ years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in data migration projects. - Proven experience documenting CRM migrations, with specific expertise in HubSpot CRM. - CRM platform Salesforce is required - Familiarity with Chargebee platform - Data Analysis and Documentation Tools: - Proficiency in SQL for analyzing and validating source data. - Experience with Power BI, Tableau, or similar tools for data visualization and reporting. - Strong command of Excel or Google Sheets for data mapping and analysis. - Hands-on experience with HubSpot’s data import/export tools and API functionalities. - Familiarity with data cleansing and profiling tools like Insycle, Talend, or OpenRefine. Soft Skills: - Strong analytical skills to assess data structures, relationships, and quality. - Exceptional organizational skills with the ability to manage and document complex processes. - Clear and concise communication skills to document requirements and workflows for technical and non-technical stakeholders. - Ability to work collaboratively with diverse teams in a fast-paced environment. Preferred Qualifications: - HubSpot certifications (e.g., HubSpot CRM Data Management, HubSpot Reporting, or HubSpot Sales Software). - Understanding of GDPR, CCPA, or other data privacy regulations related to CRM systems. - Experience with project management tools such as Jira, Trello, or Asana. Key Responsibilities - Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand migration objectives, data requirements, and key success criteria. - Gather and document functional and non-functional requirements for the migration. - Develop source-to-target data mapping documents, detailing how data from the source system aligns with HubSpot's data model, including core objects (Contacts, Companies, Deals, and Custom Objects). - Specify data transformation and cleansing rules to ensure compatibility with HubSpot. - Create detailed documentation for each stage of the data migration process, including extraction, transformation, loading (ETL), and validation workflows. - Develop flowcharts, diagrams, and step-by-step guides to visually represent the migration process. - Maintain a centralized repository for all migration-related documentation. - Define and document data quality criteria, such as completeness, accuracy, and consistency. - Collaborate with technical teams to validate migrated data against requirements. - Document findings from data quality checks, pre- and post-migration validation, and User Acceptance Testing (UAT). - Identify and document requirements for custom fields and properties in HubSpot. - Coordinate with HubSpot administrators to record configurations and ensure alignment with business workflows. - Collaboration and Communication: - Serve as a liaison between business users and technical teams, translating business needs into technical documentation. - Regularly update stakeholders on migration progress through detailed reports and presentations. - Document post-migration steps, including workflows, error resolution strategies, and recommendations for ongoing data maintenance in HubSpot.
title: Business Analyst (Documanting Data Migration Process To Hubspot)
