description: Job Overview: We are seeking an experienced macOS developer with expertise in system-level programming, user input monitoring, and automation to develop a desktop application. The app will record, store, and playback user interactions (keyboard and mouse actions) for experimentation, automation, or testing purposes. This is a freelance position requiring advanced macOS development skills and a strong understanding of system-level programming while ensuring compliance with Apple’s security and privacy guidelines. Responsibilities: • Develop a macOS application capable of recording and replaying user actions (keyboard/mouse). • Leverage Quartz Event Services (CGEventTap) to capture and monitor low-level system input events. • Implement Apple Accessibility APIs (AX Framework) for UI monitoring and interaction control. • Build precise playback algorithms for reproducing recorded actions with accurate timing. • Optimize the app’s performance using Grand Central Dispatch (GCD) and multithreading techniques. • Securely store logged actions in a database using Core Data or SQLite. • Ensure compliance with macOS sandboxing, TCC (Transparency, Consent, and Control), and other Apple security requirements. • Provide user-friendly features such as visual feedback, automation scripting integration (e.g., AppleScript or Automator), and robust UI/UX design. • Debug and troubleshoot issues using Xcode Instruments and macOS profiling tools. • Document the app’s architecture, usage, and permissions to ensure transparency and ease of maintenance. Required Skills and Experience: • Advanced macOS Development: Expert in Swift and Objective-C, with experience in building robust, user-facing macOS applications. • System-Level Programming: Proven experience working with macOS Core OS APIs, CGEventTap, and HID Framework for low-level input capture. • Automation Expertise: Familiarity with integrating automation tools, including AppleScript, Automator, or custom scripting engines. • Playback Algorithm Design: Strong knowledge of implementing precise timing and sequencing for input playback. • Database Management: Proficiency in managing logged data with Core Data or SQLite. • Security and Privacy Compliance: In-depth understanding of macOS sandboxing, hardened runtime, and user consent frameworks (TCC). • Debugging and Optimization: Advanced debugging skills using Instruments and expertise in optimizing application performance. • UI/UX Design: Ability to create intuitive interfaces for monitoring, managing, and replaying recorded actions. • Ethical Compliance: Understanding of global privacy laws (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) and Apple’s App Store guidelines. Preferred Skills: • Experience with machine learning for predictive modeling to optimize automation playback. • Familiarity with reverse engineering tools (e.g., Hopper, IDA Pro) for advanced debugging or experimentation. • Knowledge of kernel extensions (kexts) or System Extensions (though not required). • Networking skills for integrating cloud-based features to sync or share recorded actions. Deliverables: 1. A fully functional macOS desktop application capable of recording, storing, and replaying user actions. 2. Secure database for storing input logs and playback settings. 3. Intuitive UI/UX for managing the recorded actions and automation settings. 4. Documentation of system architecture, app features, and compliance measures. Project Duration and Compensation: • Duration: Estimated 6-8 weeks for the initial version, with potential for ongoing enhancements. • Compensation: Competitive rates based on experience and deliverables. Open to hourly or milestone-based payment structures. Application Requirements: • Portfolio showcasing relevant macOS applications or similar system-level projects. • Detailed resume highlighting experience with CGEventTap, AX Framework, and other relevant technologies. • Brief proposal outlining your approach to this project, including tools and technologies you plan to use. Join us in developing an innovative application that blends advanced macOS development with cutting-edge automation!
title: Advanced macOS Developer for User Interaction Recording and Playback App

description: We (@impossibleoddsmusic) seek a skilled **Embedded Security & DRM Engineer** to help develop an innovative USB-C key for secure, exclusive music and video content distribution. This device will allow access to proprietary media files protected by cutting-edge cryptology and digital signatures. The role includes designing both the hardware and software security framework, including a companion app for users to access the media on different devices securely. **Responsibilities**: - Develop and implement a secure, encrypted platform for exclusive media content on a USB-C key. - Design digital rights management (DRM) solutions to prevent unauthorized access and piracy. - Implement cryptographic protocols and digital signature verification for secure content access. - Collaborate on the companion app for seamless user authentication and playback functionality. - Develop security layers to protect intellectual property, including hardware and software safeguards. - Coordinate closely with the project lead to align with product vision and milestones. **Requirements**: - **Experience in embedded systems**: USB key or similar portable hardware development is a plus. - **Strong background in cryptography and DRM** for media or data security. - **Proficient in app development** for both iOS and Android, with a focus on secure playback. Ability to use cross-platform frameworks, such as Flutter or React Native, to build a web with a single codebase that can work on Android and iOS applications. - Familiarity with digital rights management (DRM) protocols and secure user authentication. - Proven experience in digital security frameworks, digital signatures, and anti-piracy measures. **Preferred Qualifications**: - Experience in multimedia content protection (music, video). - Ability to work independently and adapt to project needs in a fast-paced environment. Additional Notes: Before implementation, we want to do a quick proof of concept/feasibility experiment to ensure this is viable with current phone hardware before investing deeply in the polished experience by using an “off the shelf” USB key and the most basic app. I want to verify that 1) we trigger the app launch by plugging in the USB key 2) the app can access data from the USB key, and 3) all this can be done in a low friction way without the phone requesting a ton of permissions etc from the user. Our biggest concern is in the iPhone ecosystem. Apple is notorious for stringent security policies, which might degrade or entirely prohibit the experience.
title: Embedded Security & DRM Engineer/Full Stack dev for Exclusive Music & Video USB-C Key

description: GOODFELA INC is seeking an experienced AI/ML software developer or team to design and build an AI-powered monitoring and reporting platform for 911 emergency systems. The solution will address critical challenges such as real-time outage detection, anomaly reporting, secure data sharing, and compliance with government regulations (FCC, HIPAA, etc.). This project involves developing a scalable and secure platform that integrates with Emergency Service IP Networks (ESInets) and Public Safety Answering Points (PSAPs) nationwide. Key Responsibilities: • Real-Time Monitoring: Develop a system to detect and report 911 outages, call anomalies, and cybersecurity incidents within 1 minute. • Anomaly Detection: Build and implement AI/ML models for identifying unusual call patterns, service disruptions, or cyber threats. • Secure Data Sharing: Design a framework to connect ESInets securely while maintaining system integrity and privacy compliance. • Customizable Reporting: Create dashboards and reporting tools tailored to individual PSAPs and their compliance needs. • Testing Framework: Develop a simulated testing environment for validating the platform under various scenarios (e.g., traffic surges, cyberattacks). Required Skills and Expertise: 1. AI/ML Development: Experience in building anomaly detection models using TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks. 2. Backend Development: Proficiency in Python, Node.js, or similar languages. 3. Database Management: Expertise with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or other scalable databases. 4. Cybersecurity: Knowledge of data encryption, HIPAA compliance, and secure API development. 5. Cloud Infrastructure: Experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for scalable deployment. 6. Frontend Development: Ability to create user-friendly dashboards and reporting interfaces. Preferred Experience: • Previous work on public safety, healthcare, or government compliance projects. • Familiarity with FCC regulations and Next Generation 911 (NG911) systems. • Experience in SaaS development and real-time systems. Deliverables: 1. Functional prototype (MVP) showcasing core features. 2. Complete software platform with secure data sharing and customizable reporting. 3. Documentation and training materials for system implementation. 4. Compliance assurance for HIPAA, FCC, and other relevant regulations. Project Timeline: We aim to complete the prototype within 3 months, with full implementation within 6-9 months. Budget: Negotiable based on experience and scope. Please include a detailed breakdown in your proposal. To Apply: Please provide: 1. A brief description of your experience with similar projects. 2. Examples of previous work, especially related to AI/ML, public safety, or government compliance. 3. A proposed timeline and budget estimate. 4. Your approach to building a secure and scalable solution.
title: AI-Driven Software Developer for 911 Monitoring and Anomaly Detection Platform

description: Job Description: AI-Powered Sports Prediction App Developer We are seeking a highly skilled software engineer or developer to create a cutting-edge AI-powered sports prediction app. This project will combine intuitive design, powerful predictive algorithms, and innovative features to provide users with a superior sports prediction experience. The ideal candidate will have expertise in both app and web development, with a strong focus on artificial intelligence integration and sports data analytics. If you are passionate about sports and technology and enjoy solving complex problems, we want to hear from you! Project Overview The goal is to build an all-in-one sports prediction platform that integrates the best features from existing tools while introducing unique functionalities to set our app apart. Here’s a breakdown of the key inspirations and features from existing platforms: 1. Inspiration from Current Tools Below are some apps/tools we admire for their strengths: Outlier: User-friendly interface, intuitive layout, and ease of use. OddsJam: Arbitrage sports betting tool—a standout feature in the market. Rotowire: Fast, real-time updates on injuries, line movements, and sportsbook odds. DraftEdge: Token-based AI analyzer for player and game-specific performance analysis. Daily Grind (DG Fantasy): AI-generated player prop slips based on user-defined criteria. BettingPros: AI chatbot for interactive player and game insights. 2. Unique Features to Combine and Expand The app will integrate and expand on these features to create a unified, industry-leading solution: Simulator: Simulate player and game predictions while factoring in variables like injuries, time restrictions, matchups, and other performance-affecting factors. Real-Time AI Insights: Live updates on odds, line movements, injuries, and player status across multiple sportsbooks. Slip Generator: Automatically generate optimal player prop slips based on user-defined criteria. AI Chatbot: Interactive tool to answer user questions about specific players, teams, or games. Promo Finder: Highlight sportsbook signup bonuses, with affiliate commissions for app signups. Affiliate Program: Allow users to earn commissions by referring others to the platform. App Tiers The platform will offer three paid subscription tiers with increasing levels of functionality: Basic: Entry-level access to core predictive tools. Mid-Tier: Additional features like live updates and token-based AI analysis. Premium: Full access to simulators, the AI chatbot, and all advanced tools. Key Responsibilities Design and implement a user-friendly and intuitive interface similar to Outlier. Develop and integrate AI-based predictive algorithms and simulators. Build real-time data pipelines to fetch updates on odds, injuries, and line movements from various sportsbooks. Develop and implement tools like slip generators, arbitrage betting calculators, and interactive AI chatbots. Create an affiliate tracking system for promotions and user referrals. Ensure the platform is scalable, secure, and fast. Requirements Strong experience in web and mobile app development (React, Flutter, or similar frameworks). Expertise in AI and machine learning integration, especially in predictive modeling. Familiarity with sports data APIs (e.g., Sportradar, Odds API). Knowledge of real-time data processing and updates. Experience with creating subscription-based platforms. Strong focus on clean design and user experience. Additional Information This project offers the opportunity to shape a platform that merges the best aspects of the sports prediction and AI-driven tools landscape. If you're excited about creating something truly innovative, let’s collaborate to bring this vision to life.
title: AI-Powered Sports Prediction App Developer

description: We are seeking an experienced legal professional to join our team as a contract-based Chief of Contracts. As the go-to legal expert, your key responsibilities will include: - Contract Management: Drafting, reviewing, and negotiating contracts related to stock options, sales, and other corporate agreements. Ensuring all contracts are compliant with current laws and regulations. - Cap Table Management: Overseeing the maintenance and accuracy of capitalization tables using CARTA software, providing real-time updates and executive-level reporting. - Stock Options and Sales: Managing the lifecycle of stock options including issuance, vesting, and exercise. Facilitating and recording stock sales, maintaining meticulous records. - Technology Integration: Understanding and working with web applications and APIs to integrate legal processes with business operations. Demonstrating a willingness to learn and adapt to new tech environments. - Communication: Utilizing AI-enhanced strategies to ensure clarity and precision in all legal correspondence and meetings. The ideal candidate will have: - Licensed lawyer in the United States with extensive experience in contract law and cap table management. - Proficiency with capitalization table software like CARTA. - Strong technical skills, including familiarity with web apps and APIs. - Excellent communication abilities, both written and verbal. - A track record of delivering high-quality, ethical legal work. - The ability to work independently and manage time efficiently. This is an excellent opportunity to leverage your legal expertise in a fast-paced, technology-driven environment. If you're excited to serve as a trusted silent partner, please apply with your resume, a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience, and any applicable certifications or references.
title: Chief of Contracts - Experienced Legal Contractor for Cap Table & Contract Management

description: Join a Growing, Innovative Firm! Are you an accountant looking for an opportunity where your experience can shine, but also where creativity and innovative thinking are valued? If you’re interested in being part of a growing firm that’s committed to thinking outside the box, solving real-world client challenges, and helping us stay ahead in the industry, keep reading! What We’re Looking For You should have: An eye for detail—spotting inconsistencies and investigating the "why" until a solution is found. A love for client interaction, approaching requests with patience and understanding, knowing that clients hire us to solve their challenges. Confidence in preparing and presenting financial information to clients. A passion for working with entrepreneurs—delivering the best solutions to keep costs low and quality high, allowing clients to focus on their mission. Resourcefulness—while you may not know everything upfront, you should be committed to researching, asking questions, and finding the answers. A mindset that values generosity and a "whatever it takes" attitude to get the job done. Key Responsibilities As part of our team, you'll be responsible for: Entering daily transactions across various client platforms. Responding to client requests regarding general accounting needs (running reports, providing updates, etc.). Preparing reconciliations, including bank accounts, credit cards, and general ledger accounts. Conducting self-reviews to ensure accuracy in all accounting tasks. Preparing and presenting financial statements to clients with clarity and insight. Establishing, documenting, and refining internal processes to ensure an exceptional client experience. Managing both prospective and current client correspondence. Contributing to firm growth by assisting with brand-building, lead generation, and referral outreach through social media and other platforms. Qualifications Enthusiastic about working with business owners and family-owned businesses. Experience with QuickBooks Online is required; Xero experience is a bonus. Comfortable with technology and eager to learn new software as needed. Bachelor’s degree in accounting or equivalent experience. Prior bookkeeping experience in a professional setting. What Sets Us Apart At Heartfelt CFO and Tax Services, we offer accounting, bookkeeping, tax filing, and business consulting services. Our marketing is focused on identifying the pain points of potential customers and educating them on how our services can help them achieve their financial goals. We believe in building strong relationships, and our team is not outsourced—when you join us, you become part of our mission to serve and support our clients. If you're passionate about helping clients and looking for a long-term role where you can grow, we’d love to hear from you! Apply today and let’s build a future together.?

description: Job Description: AI Software Developer for AI-Powered Customer Service Solution Company: ClosePoint USA, Title and Settlement Company Location: Remote (USA-Based Candidates Only) About Us: ClosePoint USA is a leading Title and Settlement Company with a dedicated Transaction Coordinator Division. Qualifications: • Education and Experience: • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. • Proven experience developing AI-powered applications, chatbots, or customer service solutions. • Technical Skills: • Proficiency in AI/ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar. • Strong programming skills in Python, JavaScript, or other relevant languages. • Experience with API integration (e.g., JotForm, Dotloop, Google Workspace). • Familiarity with natural language processing (NLP) and conversational AI platforms (e.g., Dialogflow, GPT-based APIs). • Other Skills: • Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities. • Excellent communication skills to collaborate with stakeholders. • Detail-oriented with a focus on creating user-friendly interfaces. • Preferred: • Experience in the title, real estate, or settlement industry. • Understanding of New Jersey and Pennsylvania title requirements. Work Environment and Compensation: • Location: Remote (must reside in the USA). • Compensation: Competitive and commensurate with experience. • Contract Type: Freelance/Contract. • Project Timeline: Initial project completion expected within 3-6 months, with potential for ongoing work. How to Apply: Please submit your proposal on Upwork, including: 1. A cover letter outlining your relevant experience and approach to the project. 2. Examples of similar AI projects you have completed. 3. Your availability and proposed timeline. 4. Your hourly or project-based rate. Qualifications: - Technical Expertise: - Proven experience with Adobe Workfront, Adobe AEM, and Adobe Forms in an enterprise environment. - Strong knowledge of U.S. government IT infrastructure and procurement processes, including experience with applicable federal standards. - Proficiency in architecting solutions that integrate with other enterprise systems and tools. - Pre-Sales Experience: - Minimum of 5 years of experience in a pre-sales engineering or solutions architect role, preferably focused on SAAS or digital marketing platforms. - Demonstrated ability to lead technical discovery sessions and develop solutions that meet both business and technical needs. - Experience responding to RFPs and creating tailored proposals for government agencies. - Soft Skills: - Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. - Strong problem-solving skills, with an ability to think strategically and drive solution adoption. - Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and work under tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment. **Preferred Skills**: - Certifications in Adobe Workfront, AEM, or Adobe Forms. - Experience working with government agencies, particularly in defense, health, education, or public sector. - Demonstrated experience winning business with competitive presentations and proposals Location: - Remote with travel to client sites as needed. --- This role is ideal for candidates passionate about helping government agencies achieve digital transformation through innovative use of Adobe's suite of products. description: Job Overview: We are seeking a skilled Full-Stack Developer to join our team and contribute to our project. The developer will focus on building, optimizing, and validating the login, signup, and authentication flows, ensuring a seamless and secure user experience for both candidates and employers. The role involves working with modern frameworks and cloud-based technologies. Responsibilities: 1. Login and Signup Flow Development: Sign-In Flow: - Build secure login UI and APIs with OTP and JWT authentication for candidates and employers. - Implement “Remember Me” functionality, session management, and refresh tokens. - Add required URLs, toast messages, and loaders. - Integrate validation mechanisms, including CAPTCHA. Sign-Up Flow: - Develop signup forms with email/phone OTP verification and unique credential validation. -Implement user agreements and acknowledgment sections with terms and conditions. - Design promo-code integration and ensure secure database storage. - Handle email/mobile verification before enabling form submission. Forgot Password & Change Phone: - Implement OTP verification for password recovery and phone number updates. - Build APIs for updating and securely storing user information. 2. Migration of Existing Login/Signup Flow: - Replace Azure ADB2C authentication mechanisms with newly developed custom flows for both candidates and employers. 3. Quality Assurance (QA): - Conduct end-to-end testing for all modules to ensure functionality, performance, and security compliance. Qualifications: - Proficiency in MS.NET, React.js, and Azure Cloud. - Strong experience with SQL databases and backend API development. - Hands-on expertise in implementing JWT authentication and OTP verification. - Knowledge of validation protocols like CAPTCHA integration. - Familiarity with Azure Active Directory (ADB2C) workflows and custom flow creation. - Proven ability to build secure and scalable web applications. - Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Preferred Skills: -Experience in user session management and token-based authentication. - Ability to optimize user interfaces for speed and accessibility. - Previous experience with end-to-end QA testing of web applications. This project will also require mobile app experience and be able to deploy out code to the appropriate mobile app stores on top of deploying code to our web application. As for our bug fixes, we are looking for a full-stack developer to take a deep dive into our code, assess any irregularities and/or provide constructive feedback on processes, inefficiencies, and/or bugs.
title: Login, Sign Up, Sign In Flow and Code Clean Up

Facilitate casting, location scouting, and resource allocation. Budget and Resource Management: Track expenses and ensure projects stay within budget. Negotiate contracts with vendors, talent, and crew members. Source and allocate resources effectively to meet project needs. Risk Management and Problem-Solving: Identify potential challenges and develop contingency plans. Ensure compliance with industry regulations and safety standards. Address on-set or production-related issues promptly and efficiently. Post-Production Oversight: Oversee editing, sound design, visual effects, and other post-production processes. Coordinate with distribution and marketing teams to meet release deadlines. Qualifications and Experience Proven experience as a Film Project Manager, Line Producer, or similar role in film or television production. Strong understanding of the filmmaking process, including pre-production, production, and post-production. Exceptional organizational, time management, and multitasking skills. Ability to lead and motivate diverse teams under tight deadlines. Proficiency in production management software and tools. Strong negotiation, budgeting, and problem-solving abilities. description: POSITION OVERVIEW: We seek a self-driven, highly motivated engineer with a strong background in Mold design and other plastic forming technologies. This candidate will manage the Mold development, procurement and validation and ensure that we are taking advantage of the best and most innovative technologies available to design, produce and maintain Molds. CORE RESPONSIBILITIES: Developing and implementing tooling strategies to support production goals. Manage new tool construction projects. Collaborating with engineering and production teams to ensure efficient tooling design and implementation. Manage the tooling repair department. Designing and developing tooling for large-scale machinery, ensuring compatibility with high-tonnage presses and other advanced equipment. Collaborating with engineering and production teams to optimize tooling for large-scale, complex machinery operations. Monitoring tooling performance and identifying areas for improvement. Designing and developing new tooling, fixtures, and gages to support production activities. Creating and maintaining documentation for all tooling and processes. Analysing data to identify areas for improvement and making recommendations. Collaborating with suppliers to ensure quality and reliability of tooling. Research technologies for enhanced Mold repair, maintenance and construction of new and existing Molds and ensure improved performance. Collaborate with engineering to assure new and existing product and tool designs are moldable and suggest design changes or alternative processes. Proactively seek opportunities for Continuous Improvement by researching new technologies for improvements to product, Molds, materials, and manufacturing. Collaborate with vendors to bring alternative methods, materials, and equipment to manufacturing to improve Molds and Mold maintenance. Assist manufacturing in process improvement. QUALIFICATIONS: A bachelor’s degree in engineering or a related field. 15+ years’ experience in the Injection molding industry with focus on tool design. 10+ years in supervisory and management capacity. Strong project management skills. Direct hands-on experience in Mold design and construction is a must. Experience working with large-scale machinery, including presses with significant tonnage (e.g., among the largest in the industry) Proven ability to design and manage tooling projects for complex, high-capacity manufacturing equipment. Proficient with 3D modelling software. Ability to read and interpret Moldflow analyses. Background in working with various Mold material and metal types. Advanced experience in both cold runner and hot runner manifold systems. Strong analytical, creativity, and problem-solving skills. Experience collaborating with teams of engineers and technicians. Excellent written/verbal communication skills, and superior interpersonal skills for interaction with all levels of personnel and contacts within and outside company. Proficient in presentations, technical reports, and situational analysis. Good working knowledge of plastics manufacturing processes including injection molding, extrusion, blow Mold, thermoform and others. Background in working with various polymers. Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Travel is a critical part of this role and can be every week depending on situation. MUST HAVE A bachelor’s degree in engineering or a related field. 15+ years’ experience in the Injection molding industry with focus on tool design. 10+ years in supervisory and management capacity. Experience with large-scale machinery and tooling for high-capacity production environments. Strong project management skills. Direct hands-on experience in Mold design and construction is a must. Experience with 3D modelling software. (SolidWorks) Ability to read and interpret Moldflow analyses. Experience in working with various Mold material and metal types. Advanced experience in both cold runner and hot runner manifold systems. Experience collaborating with teams of engineers and technicians. Experience of plastics manufacturing processes including injection molding, extrusion, blow Mold, thermoform and others. Experience in working with various polymers. Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Travel is a critical part of this role and can be every week depending on situation.
title: Tooling Engineer

description: I’m the founder of a fast-growing business, and I need a detail-oriented financial analyst/bookkeeper to help me audit and organize my finances. The goal is to create a clear financial picture by reviewing data from January 1, 2024, to present. You’ll work one-on-one with me to identify trends, reconcile accounts, and develop actionable insights. Responsibilities: • Audit financial data from our custom CRM, AMEX statements, and processed checks. • Reconcile all revenue and expenses for the year to date, ensuring all accounts balance. • Identify and report discrepancies or inefficiencies in spending. • Create detailed financial reports, including cash flow analysis, profit margins, and expense breakdowns. • Collaborate with me to suggest areas for cost savings or increased profitability. Requirements: • Proven experience in accounting, financial analysis, or forensic bookkeeping. • Proficiency in reconciling credit card statements, checks, and CRM data. • Strong Excel/Google Sheets skills for creating custom financial reports. • Excellent communication skills to explain findings clearly and concisely. • Attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy. • Familiarity with CRM systems and financial software (experience with TypeScript-based CRM is a plus). Preferred Qualifications: • Experience working with startups or rapidly scaling businesses. • Knowledge of AMEX business accounts and processing workflows. • Prior experience conducting financial audits or consulting on cash flow management. Deliverables: • A full audit of my business finances from January 1 to present. • Clear and actionable reports showing revenue, expenses, and overall profitability. • Recommendations for optimizing financial operations moving forward. Timeline: I would like to start as soon as possible, with the audit completed within 2-4 weeks. Confidentiality: You’ll be handling sensitive financial information, so confidentiality and trust are absolutely essential. Please provide references or examples of similar work upon request. Budget: Open to hourly or fixed pricing—please provide your rate and estimated hours for completing this project.
title: Financial Analyst/Bookkeeper Needed for Business Audit and Financial Reporting

description: About Us: Willow is an innovative SaaS edtech platform dedicated to transforming high school into a purpose-driven journey for students. We help students discover their passions, explore career paths, and uncover educational opportunities through dynamic, AI-driven tools. As a startup, we move fast, embrace creativity, and rely on a small, collaborative team where everyone wears many hats. The Role: We’re seeking a talented and motivated UI/UX Designer to join our team on a part-time basis (~15 hours per week). In this role, you will turn ideas into prototypes, create and run usability tests, and transform validated prototypes into high-fidelity designs. You’ll also contribute to the user research process, ensuring our designs are grounded in the needs and experiences of our student and educator users. As part of a fast-moving startup, your work will have a direct impact on our product, and you’ll have the opportunity to help shape the future of Willow. Responsibilities: - Collaborate with the team to turn concepts into interactive prototypes. - Design and execute usability tests to gather actionable feedback. - Evolve prototypes into pixel-perfect, high-fidelity designs ready for development. - Conduct user research and testing sessions to inform design decisions. - Work closely with developers to ensure seamless implementation of designs. - Maintain and contribute to our design system to ensure consistency across the platform. - Embrace a hands-on approach, taking on a variety of tasks to support our small but mighty team. Qualifications: - Proven experience in UI/UX design with a strong portfolio showcasing prototypes and high-fidelity designs. - Proficiency in Figma. - Experience with usability testing and user research methodologies. - Strong understanding of responsive and mobile-first design principles. - Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. - Excellent communication skills to convey ideas and insights effectively. - Experience in the education sector or edtech is a plus. What We Offer: - Flexible hours to fit your schedule. - A collaborative, startup environment where your ideas and creativity are valued. - The chance to make a meaningful impact on students' lives and futures.

description: I am a General Contractor in Northern Virginia. A client had their front door kicked in and will be going through insurance for the repair. I do not usually do insurance work and do not have the Xactimate software but would like to provide them a quote using it. I need someone familiar with the software to do a detailed estimate and align it with my own idea of what I would charge for the job. I would prefer a fixed price for generating the estimate since it should be fairly straightforward but will entertain hourly. The door and jamb need to be replaced. The main slab is delaminated, and the hinges/ hinge jamb are broken into pieces. The attached pictures are after I repaired what I could. The door is a 3068 RH Fiberglass 6 panel entry door. It has an integrated 12" sidelight on the left. The total width is 50 3/4". Above the door is a 12" tall transom window added to the door in the field and installed as one unit. PVC brick molding on the exterior. 3.5" casing interior. The house has a brick facade, so it needs extension jambs. Will need paint and calk inside and out. New handle hardware, and electronic deadbolt. I also did an emergency repair Thanksgiving morning to secure the property that I would like to include. Please let me know if this is something you can provide me with and what the cost would be. Thank you John
title: Xactimate construction estimate for insurance repair of front door

description: Backstory I have no prior experience in coding or software development. However, I have a strong understanding of software, AI, and their applications. I excel at grasping how to use and apply software in practical, contextual ways. Long story short, I know how to use and manipulate these areas, I don't know how to build them. By leveraging AI tools and self-teaching, I’ve been able to: Create a Full Codebase: I’ve developed and structured the foundational code for my platform entirely on my own. Build a Local Development Environment: I’ve set up a functional Windows environment to test and validate my code using synthetic data generated by a custom-built synthetic data generator. Run and Test Code: I’ve written and executed Python scripts to generate logs, validate outputs, and ensure functionality. Manage Data Locally: All development work has been done in Notepad++, with files stored locally on my computer. I’ve made significant progress, but I’ve reached a point where I need expert guidance to ensure the project is scalable, efficient, and prepared for transition into a fully functioning product. What I’m Looking For I need a skilled developer, engineer, or technical consultant to help me transition from a self-guided project into a robust, scalable system. Specifically, I need assistance with: 1. Optimizing My Development Workflow Guidance on efficiently using tools I’ve already acquired, such as Docker, Google Cloud Storage (GCS), Visual Studio, and GitHub. Suggestions for additional tools or processes that would streamline my development pipeline. 2. Establishing a Scalable Backend Foundation Reviewing and optimizing my current codebase and internal development processes. Setting up a scalable backend infrastructure that can handle real-world data, users, and operations. Implementing best practices for version control, testing, and deployment pipelines. 3. Preparing for Frontend Development Advising on how to structure the backend to ensure a smooth transition to the frontend UI. Helping me prepare for integration with a React-based UI that includes features like document uploads, conversational AI, and custom widgets for data insights. Ensuring the backend design supports multi-user login and secure data handling for customers. 4. Identifying the Best Path Forward Collaborating on a roadmap to get this project from its current state to an MVP (Minimum Viable Product). Recommending the most efficient and scalable architecture for long-term growth. What I’ve Accomplished So Far: Built and tested a synthetic data generator to simulate and validate the platform’s functionality. Created Python scripts to run synthetic data tests and validate outputs. Set up and tested a basic local development environment to verify initial code functionality. Acquired foundational tools like Docker, GCS, and GitHub, though I need help utilizing them effectively. What I Need From You: I’m looking for someone who can: Help me understand and efficiently utilize development tools and workflows. Review, optimize, and build upon the codebase I’ve created. Guide the development of a scalable backend while preparing for the frontend UI. Provide actionable advice to implement a clean, scalable architecture for my platform. Collaborate with me in a way that fosters learning—I want to deeply understand the tools, processes, and decisions behind this project. This is an opportunity to work on a unique project where innovation and foundational thinking are core. If you’re experienced in backend architecture, full-stack development, or scaling software projects, I’d love to collaborate with you to bring this vision to life.
title: Developing new AI software. I need help.

description: Updated Project Brief: Dante Video AV-H Encoder and Decoder Project Objective: To design, develop, and manufacture a new line of Dante AV-H encoders and decoders that are PoE powered and compatible with Dante AV networking. These devices will be available in various form factors, including chassis-based cards, standalone surface-mount units, and standalone wall-plate units. Key Features: PoE Powering: All devices will be powered over Ethernet (PoE) for simplified installation. Dante AV Compatibility: Devices will seamlessly integrate with Dante AV networks, enabling flexible audio-visual distribution and routing. Multiple Form Factors: Chassis-Based Cards: Hot-swappable cards for flexible configuration in Dante AV systems. Standalone Surface-Mount Units: Compact, self-contained units for desktop or rack-mount applications. Standalone Wall-Plate Units: Discreet, wall-mountable units for AV distribution in conference rooms and other spaces. Robust AV Connectivity: HDMI: High-bandwidth digital video and audio connectivity. Analog Balanced Audio: Professional-grade audio input and output. User-Friendly Indicators: Power Lights: Visual confirmation of power status. Streaming Lights: Indication of Dante AV network connectivity and streaming status. Hardware Specifications: CPU/SoC: 32-bit/64-bit ARM or x86 SoC Software: Linux v.4.19 or later with support for running containers Flash Storage Space: 64 MB Video Codec: H.264/AVC and H.265/HEVC Resolution Support: 1920x1080 2560x1440 3840x2160 (4K) Frame Rate Support: 29.97, 30, 59.97, 60 fps Video Latency: A few frames Audio: 2x2 Dante audio channels Network: Standard 1 GbE Dante AV-H Benefits: Interoperability: Seamless integration with the extensive Dante AV ecosystem. Flexibility: Independent routing of video and audio streams. Scalability: Easily expand systems as needed. Reliability: Robust and reliable performance. Security: Enhanced security features with Dante Domain Manager or Dante Director. Target Market: Professional AV integrators Corporate AV departments Education institutions Houses of worship Broadcast facilities Project Scope Document: Dante Video AV-H Encoder and Decoder 1. Product Development: Hardware Design: Design and develop hardware for all form factors (chassis cards, standalone units, wall-plate units). Ensure compliance with PoE standards and Dante AV protocols. Design and integrate HDMI, analog audio, and Ethernet interfaces. Design and implement power supply circuitry for PoE operation. Develop PCB layouts and schematics. Select and integrate appropriate CPU/SoC, flash storage, and video codec components. Design the hardware to support user-selectable resolutions and frame rates. Firmware Development: Develop firmware for all form factors. Implement Dante AV protocol support. Develop firmware for device configuration and control, including user interface for selecting resolution and frame rate. Implement firmware for monitoring device status and diagnostics. Optimize firmware for low-latency video processing and efficient resource utilization. Implement video encoding and decoding algorithms to support the specified resolutions and frame rates. Mechanical Design: Design and develop mechanical enclosures for standalone units and wall-plate units. Design and develop chassis card form factor. Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations. 2. Testing and Validation: Functional Testing: Verify functionality of all features and interfaces. Test Dante AV integration and performance. Test PoE power delivery and operation. Test video and audio quality, including resolution, frame rate, and latency, at all supported configurations. Test user interface for selecting resolution and frame rate. Environmental Testing: Test for temperature, humidity, vibration, and shock. Test for electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) and radio frequency interference (RFI). Interoperability Testing: Test interoperability with other Dante AV devices. Test interoperability with third-party AV equipment. 3. Manufacturing and Production: Procurement of Components: Source and procure all necessary components. Establish reliable supply chains. Manufacturing Process: Develop manufacturing processes for all form factors. Implement quality control procedures. Production Testing: Test manufactured units to ensure quality and reliability. 4. Documentation and Support: User Manuals: Develop user manuals for all form factors. Provide clear instructions for installation, configuration, and operation, including instructions for selecting resolution and frame rate. Technical Documentation: Develop technical documentation, including schematics, firmware documentation, and test reports. Customer Support: Establish customer support channels. Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance.
title: Electrical PCB Designer

Driver updates and peripheral software support. Basic IT troubleshooting, similar to a standard warranty service. Additional Services: Extra Sessions: Additional remote support sessions beyond the included three can be scheduled at a reduced per-session rate. Notes: Our current equipment is fully set up; complete with ongoing support. Each support session includes step-by-step remote guidance to resolve connection issues or minor equipment repairs. Long-Term Vision: As our firm expands and IT needs become more complex, we’re seeking a partnership that can scale with us, evolving to support our growth.
title: Looking for IT support professionals with experience.

description: Job Description: Menu2Scan.com is evolving! We are rebranding into a versatile platform poised to explore and capitalize on multiple verticals. To realize this vision, we’re seeking an experienced Senior Full-Stack Developer to upgrade our application, integrate essential features, and ensure scalability for diverse use cases. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to a transformative project that blends innovation, usability, and robust technology. Key Responsibilities: • Platform Rebranding: Assist in the transformation of Menu2Scan.com into a scalable platform adaptable for various verticals. • Feature Development: Add functionality for generating diverse types of QR codes and upgrade the existing QR code library to accommodate new business requirements. • Payment Gateway Integration: Finalize and implement a seamless payment solution to support expanded functionalities. • Frontend Development: Build and enhance the user interface using Next.js and React, ensuring a seamless user experience for multiple verticals. • Backend Development: Develop scalable backend solutions with Node.js to support new features and future growth. • Cloud Portability: Optimize the platform to remain on GCP and Firebase while ensuring minimal effort is required to migrate to AWS, Azure, or other cloud providers. • Scalability: Architect and implement solutions to support a growing user base across multiple industries. Qualifications: • Experience: 5+ years in full-stack development with expertise in Next.js, React, and Node.js. • Frontend Skills: Proficiency in building user-friendly, responsive interfaces. • Backend Knowledge: Strong API development and server-side expertise with scalable solutions. • Cloud Experience: Hands-on experience with GCP and Firebase, with an understanding of cloud portability to AWS and Azure. • Adaptability: Ability to develop solutions that cater to different industries and use cases. Preferred Skills: • Experience working with QR code libraries and customizations. • Knowledge of payment gateway technologies. • Familiarity with CI/CD workflows and cloud DevOps. • Proven track record in scalable architecture design. Why Join Us? • Be part of a transformative project that is expanding into multiple verticals. • Work with cutting-edge technologies in a collaborative, innovative environment. • Flexible remote work opportunities with clear and meaningful goals. How to Apply: If you’re excited about contributing to a platform rebrand and developing solutions for multiple industries, we’d love to hear from you. Please include your resume, portfolio, and any relevant examples of your work in your application.

description: There are these physical chess e-boards called DGT (https://digitalgametechnology.com/products/home-use-e-boards). You connect by bluetooth to your computer, and they can send your moves to live chess games on e.g. lichess.org. I have an iOS companion app for this which I hired someone to work on a while ago, but the project ended up not being completed with some bugs remaining to fix. The way it works is: - you turn on your dgt physical chess board - you log into your laptop, connect it to the board, and start a game - you start the mobile app and can ignore the laptop, and the mobile app shows a game clock and alerts you to moves by your opponent DGT board —laptop—-lichess.org—-mobile app The idea is that this feels more like an in-person game with a chess clock than having to look at the computer. The app is written in swift. I’m a software engineer but am not a swift developer. The code is somewhat messy and has some bugs, eg sometimes the screen randomly turns black due to some race conditions This project: - I’ll send you the source code - you should do Q&A to find and list the bugs and then fix them - (maybe) help shepherd the app through the App Store release process The mobile app uses the lichess read-only API, so there is no need to communicate between the board and the website You don’t actually need the board in order to do this project. You can just start some games in lichess in your browser then connect to the same game from your iPhone or emulator
title: Debug and polish a lichess.org iOS companion app

description: We are looking for someone who loves using and teaching SAS. We want to see your teaching style. Are you upbeat? Boring? How do you engage the students? What's your vocal delivery like? Can you successfully teach the concept and ensure that it sinks in? We are a group of passionate instructors that help our clients understand not only the technical aspects of how to use various technologies, but also how to use it to solve important problems and drive business value. The ideal candidate will be hired for several training opportunities, allowing for a flexible schedule. The majority of our trainings are M-F, so availability during the week is a must. We offer both full and part-day trainings (2-3 hours). As a trainer, you will have opportunities throughout the year to provide trainings to the relevant clients. About 90% of our trainings are done virtually. Our trainers select the opportunities that fit their schedules and then they help our clients learn the software in 2–5 day training sessions. Occasionally, we do offer in-person trainings, for those who are interested. We need people who are passionate about technology and helping other people succeed. If this sounds like you, we’d love to have you as one of our instructors.
title: SAS Instructor for our Client

description: Hey! We run a little tech recruiting agency, focusing on finding and placing software engineers at early-stage startups. We're looking for someone to respond to candidate emails, take calls, and submit candidates that seem promising. This isn't a typical recruiting role as sourcing + reaching out to candidates is NOT part of this job! Just responding + taking calls + submitting. You'll need to be very personable and have great communication skills, as well as be reasonably technical. For the technical side, you'll be using email, phone, submitting resumes, and using our custom app. We're flexible on compensation, but we would like some kind of performance-based reward. We're thinking some base hourly rate + $1k for each person hired that you submit. Based on our current metrics, we estimate you'll land 2-4 hires a month if you work 40 hours a week. Let us know in your application what base you'd be comfortable with, given that. Looking forward to hearing from you!
title: Recruiting Coordinator

description: Description: We are urgently seeking a qualified consultant with expertise in FDA regulations to review and provide guidance on a set of internal quality and regulatory recommendations for our Class 1 510(k)-exempt medical device. This project requires a fast turnaround to help us ensure compliance while avoiding unnecessary actions that could delay production or increase costs. Scope of Work: The consultant will: 1. Review recommendations covering: -Documentation updates (design outputs, work instructions, DHF updates). -Hardware verification protocols (sterile and nonsterile testing). -Quality management obligations (QMS compliance, distribution processes). -Software compliance with FDA and IEC standards. -General operational and project management processes. 2. Provide feedback on which activities are necessary for FDA compliance and which may be excessive for a Class 1 510(k)-exempt device. 3. Deliver a concise, actionable report with prioritized recommendations and guidance. Ideal Candidate: -Expertise in FDA regulations for Class 1 medical devices and exemptions. -Familiarity with IEC 60601 and IEC 62304 standards for hardware and software compliance. -Strong background in ISO 13485 and quality systems. -Proven ability to assess regulatory recommendations critically and suggest cost- and time-efficient solutions. Additional Information: We require this review and guidance within a short timeframe. If successful, there is potential for ongoing collaboration.
title: FDA Regulatory and Quality Consultant for Class 1 Medical Device Review

description: We are looking for an experienced expert in Warehouse Management System (WMS) solutions to support our team in sourcing and implementing the ideal WMS software for a small business client. The expert will play an active role in the deployment process, collaborating closely with our team to oversee integration and ensure a smooth transition. They will also provide training to the client’s staff and assist with any necessary customizations for the client’s specific workflows. The ideal candidate should have a successful track record of WMS implementation, especially working with clients at an international level. Strong project management and communication skills are essential, along with a patient and adaptable approach to handle challenges and ensure all project goals are met. If the project is successful, there is an opportunity for the expert to join our team for future projects and long-term collaboration. NDA will be required
title: WMS Implementation & WMS Sourcing

description: We are a D2C telemedicine company. We are seeking a highly skilled Front-End Software Developer with a minimum of 4 years of experience to work on a couple of projects with our in-house engineering team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience building web application interfaces and a deep understanding of modern front-end technologies. This is an exclusively front-end task. You will not need to worry about backend integrations. Key Responsibilities: - Develop and implement user interface components using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. -Collaborate with designers to translate mockups and wireframes into high-quality code. -Implement responsive design using MUI components and Tailwind CSS. -Optimize components for maximum performance across various devices and browsers. Qualifications: Experience: Minimum of 4 years as a Front-End Developer. Technical Skills: -Proficient in React and Next.js frameworks. -Strong experience with TypeScript. -Expertise in MUI components and Tailwind CSS. -Understanding of responsive design principles and mobile-first development. Soft Skills: -Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. -Excellent communication and teamwork abilities. -Ability to work independently and manage time effectively. If you're interested in this project, please share with us at least three projects that you've worked on so we can review the work. Be sure to provide URLs. Thank you
